help.title: Study Mode Settings Help
help.content:
Study mode settings determine which language will be shown first during learning.

üÉè Word Card Study
‚Ä¢ TargetVoca selection: Card front shows TargetVoca side every time
‚Ä¢ ReferenceVoca selection: Card front shows ReferenceVoca side every time
‚Ä¢ Random: Random language is shown on card front for each card

üéÆ Game Study
‚Ä¢ If TargetVoca is selected, you must submit TargetVoca as the answer
‚Ä¢ If ReferenceVoca is selected, you must submit ReferenceVoca as the answer
‚Ä¢ Random: Random answer language is determined for each question

This setting applies to word cards, favorites, wrong words, and games.
